casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Demario Lamont SNEAD. No. 90PA15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. C. Scott Holmes, Wilmington, for Snead, Demario Lamont. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Staples S. Hughes, Durham, for Snead, Demario Lamont. Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 26th of March 2015 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
